Package com.avanza.astrix.beans.ft

Defines the core abstractions for protecting a method invocation by some fault-tolerance mechanism.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BeanFaultTolerance
    A BeanFaultTolerance instance is used to protect a an Astrix bean invocation with fault isolation.
    BeanFaultToleranceFactory  
    BeanFaultToleranceFactorySpi  
    HystrixCommandNamingStrategy  
    MonitorableFaultToleranceSpi

    DefaultHystrixCommandNamingStrategy  
    FaultToleranceModule  
    NoFaultTolerance  

Package com.avanza.astrix.beans.ft Description

Defines the core abstractions for protecting a method invocation by some fault-tolerance mechanism.
